summary:
## The Ten Commandments

The Ten Commandments are rules for living a good life, given by God to Moses in the Bible. They are found in three places in the Bible, with slight differences.

These commandments are important to many religions. People believe they were written by God on stone tablets. Scholars, though, debate when and by whom they were actually written, noting similarities to laws from other ancient cultures.
title: Ten Commandments
